high_descs: Turn and go to the counter in between the two sinks.
Pick up the candle that is on the counter.
Turn and go to the toilet on the side where the towel is hanging on the wall.
Place the candle behind the empty roll of toilet paper that is on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Move the candle to the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Pick up the candle from the vanity.
Turn around and move to the right side of the toilet.
Set the candle on the back of the toilet to the left of the toilet paper roll.
anns.task_desc: Put a candle on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: walk forward to the sink, take two steps to the right
pick up the candle that is on the counter between the sinks
turn around, walk to shower, turn left, walk to the wall, turn left to face toilet
put the candle on the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: move candle from counter to back of toilet
